prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with blue scales and a lightning bolt tail.
I want a flying-type Pokemon that has vibrant yellow feathers and a sharp beak.
Generate an electric-type Pokemon resembling a serpent with glowing patterns.
Make a dragon-type Pokemon that features a massive wingspan and fiery breath.
Imagine a mythical creature that glows in the dark and can control electricity.
Design a Pokemon that can camouflage in urban environments with a sleek body.
Show me a fierce ground-type Pokemon that has rocky armor and sharp claws.
